Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to be performed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the period starting with Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending with SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the next occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where agreement is not reached
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Average time it takes Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to be followed by a definitive reviewer outcome (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex review paths involving multiple reminders
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the subsequent Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in revision-involved variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to Manuscript Export Succeeded in end-to-end accepted manuscript variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average waiting time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 until any final editorial decision (SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, etc.)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the next Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1, if it occurs, indicating further escalation in reviewer recruitment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 when it appears in variants containing SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit in rejection-with-resubmission pathways
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'average'}"
